example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 负担) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP-PN (NR 台北县)) (QP (CD 许多)) (NP (NN 乡镇))) (NP (NN 垃圾))))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 八里))) (PU ，) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 似乎)) (VP (VV 认份於) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (NN 边陲) (NN 岛民)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 命运))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 兀自)) (VP (VV 吞食) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VA 恶臭))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 垃圾)))))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 负担 著 台北县 许多 乡镇 垃圾 的 八里
